cgcloud__Promotion_Template_Hierarchy__c.description: Object that helps create promotion hierarchies.

cgcloud__Copied_Components__c.description: Components of a promotion that must be copied to the child promotion when a promotion is copied or derived.

cgcloud__Parent_Child_Usage_Combo__c.description: It stores the combination of parent promotion template and child promotion template for Derive Usage to avoid duplication of entries.
